extensionName.message: RuFilter - Remove russian sites from search

extensionDescription.message: An extension to exclude russian content from Google search results

languageFilterExplanation.message: This group of filters allows you to restrict search results by language for more relevant results.

searchExclusionsExplanation.message: This group of options allows you to exclude specific domains or content from search results, ensuring cleaner results.

option1Tooltip.message: Excludes all sites with the .ru domain by adding the query '-site:.ru'.

option2Tooltip.message: Excludes ru.wikipedia.org from search results by adding '-site:ru.wikipedia.org'.

option3Tooltip.message: Excludes results containing Russian characters, e.g., 'Ð¸', using '-intext:Ð¸'.

option4Tooltip.message: Allows you to add custom domains for exclusion. Each domain is added as '-site:domain'.

instructions.message: Filtering will apply on the next search. To disable, uncheck the options.

languageFilterExplanationTooltip.message: Updates the 'lr' parameter of Google search to restrict results based on language.

languageFilterNoneTooltip.message: No language filtering will be applied. The 'lr' parameter will not be set.

languageFilterUkEnTooltip.message: Search results will only include Ukrainian or English results by setting 'lr=lang_uk|lang_en'.

searchExclusionsExplanationTooltip.message: Excludes specific domains or content from search results using advanced query parameters.
